summary.span: 封裝 GDI+ 繪圖介面。

span.span: Encapsulates a GDI+ drawing surface.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供物件繪製的顯示裝置的方法。The class provides methods for drawing objects to the display device. A與特定裝置內容相關聯。A is associated with a specific device context. 您可以取得藉由呼叫物件繼承自物件上的方法，或藉由處理控制項的事件，並存取屬性類別。You can obtain a object by calling the method on an object that inherits from , or by handling a control's event and accessing the property of the class. 您也可以建立物件使用的映像從方法。You can also create a object from an image by using the method. 如需有關建立物件，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立繪圖的圖形物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-create-graphics-objects-for-drawing.md)。For more information about creating a object, see [How to: Create Graphics Objects for Drawing](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-create-graphics-objects-for-drawing.md). 您可以藉由繪製許多不同的圖案和線條物件。You can draw many different shapes and lines by using a object. 如需如何繪製線條與圖形的詳細資訊，請參閱專用`Draw` *GraphicalElement*列或您想要繪製的圖形的方法。For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see the specific `Draw`*GraphicalElement* method for the line or shape you want to draw. 這些方法包括， ， ， ，和。These methods include , , , , and . 如需如何繪製線條與圖形的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用畫筆繪製線條和圖案](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-pen-to-draw-lines-and-shapes.md)並[使用筆刷填滿圖形](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-brush-to-fill-shapes.md)。For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see [Using a Pen to Draw Lines and Shapes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-pen-to-draw-lines-and-shapes.md) and [Using a Brush to Fill Shapes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-brush-to-fill-shapes.md). 您也可以藉由繪製的影像和圖示和方法，分別。You can also draw images and icons by using the and methods, respectively. 在畫面中執行之繪圖介面的色彩資料位元區塊傳輸資訊，請參閱。To perform a bit-block transfer of color data from the screen to the drawing surface of the object, see . 如需如何繪製映像的詳細資訊物件，請參閱 < [ 使用影像、 點陣圖、 圖示和中繼檔](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md)。For more information about how to draw images with a object, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md). 此外，您可以在此操作所使用的座標系統物件。In addition, you can manipulate the coordinate system used by the object. 如需有關座標系統，以及如何操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[座標系統和轉換](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/coordinate-systems-and-transformations.md)。For more information on the coordinate system and how to manipulate it, see [Coordinate Systems and Transformations](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/coordinate-systems-and-transformations.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms and requires a object. 物件會命名為`e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The object is named `e` and is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file. 檔案命名為 SampImag.jpg，而且位於資料夾中的範例。The file is named SampImag.jpg and is located in the folder of the example. - 建立在該處描繪影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 將未縮放的影像繪製至螢幕中，使用物件。Draws the unscaled image to the screen by using a object. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#40)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是只適用於此相關聯。This method is valid only if this is associated with a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式，以及`thisForm`，則範例。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler, as well as `thisForm`, the for the example. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立的暫存資料表來建立中繼檔和取得`hdc`，其裝置內容控制代碼。Creates a temporary for creating the metafile and gets an `hdc`, a handle to its device context. - 建立新的中繼檔使用`hdc`。Creates a new metafile using the `hdc`. - 會建立顯示從中繼檔。Creates a for display of the metafile from the . - 型中繼檔繪製矩形。Draws a rectangle to the metafile. - 中繼檔中加入註解。Adds a comment to the metafile. - 處置的中繼檔，可用來關閉中繼檔。Disposes the for the metafile-which closes the metafile. - 處置中繼檔。Disposes the metafile. - 釋放暫存`hdc`。Releases the temporary `hdc`. - 處置暫存。Disposes the temporary . - 從先前建立的檔案中建立第二個中繼檔。Creates a second metafile from the previously created file. - 將中繼檔繪製到螢幕。Draws the metafile to the screen. - 處置中繼檔。Disposes the metafile. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 以這個 的目前狀態儲存圖形容器，並開啟及使用新的圖形容器。

span.span: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this and opens and uses a new graphics container.

returns.span: 這個方法會傳回 ，表示在方法呼叫時這個 的狀態。

span.span: This method returns a that represents the state of this at the time of the method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法搭配方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，並可用來還原當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 容器可以是巢狀;也就是說，您可以呼叫方法數次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您會收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法中，當時的狀態會傳回方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放在堆疊上由該方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後，所有的資訊區塊放置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會一併移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 若要呼叫在相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就如同方法呼叫會與配對方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 所建立的圖形狀態方法包括預設圖形狀態轉譯品質，任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 開啟新的圖形容器，並將儲存舊的容器。Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container. - 將轉譯的容器中的全局座標。Translates the world coordinates in the container. - 會以紅色矩形填滿 (已轉換的座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿綠色矩形 （至未轉換的座標中） 的已儲存的容器。Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是大小的綠色矩形，這個矩形相同的紅色矩形覆疊。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法搭配方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，並可用來還原當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 容器可以是巢狀;也就是說，您可以呼叫方法數次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您會收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法中，當時的狀態會傳回方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放在堆疊上由該方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後，所有的資訊區塊放置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會一併移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 若要呼叫在相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就如同方法呼叫會與配對方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 這個方法會指定與新的圖形容器的縮放變換`dstrect`和`srcrect`參數。This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters. 小數位數等於轉換，當套用至`srcrect`，會導致`dstrect`。The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`. 所建立的圖形狀態方法包括預設圖形狀態轉譯品質，任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立兩個矩形來指定新的容器的縮放變換。Creates two rectangles to specify a scale transformation for the new container. - 開啟新的圖形容器，並將儲存舊的容器。Opens the new graphics container and saves the old container. - 填入以紅色矩形 (向座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (scaled coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿綠色矩形 （無縮放區座標中） 的已儲存的容器。Fills a green rectangle (to the unscaled coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是綠色矩形，這個矩形覆疊較小的紅色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a smaller red rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法搭配方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，並可用來還原當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 容器可以是巢狀;也就是說，您可以呼叫方法數次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您會收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法中，當時的狀態會傳回方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放在堆疊上由該方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後，所有的資訊區塊放置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會一併移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 若要呼叫在相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就如同方法呼叫會與配對方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由`Save`方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the `Save` method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 這個方法會指定與新的圖形容器的縮放變換`dstrect`和`srcrect`參數。This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters. 小數位數等於轉換，當套用至`srcrect`，會導致`dstrect`。The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`. 所建立的圖形狀態方法包括預設圖形狀態轉譯品質，任何現有的呼叫方法時的呈現品質狀態變更會重設為預設值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立兩個矩形來指定新的容器的縮放變換。Creates two rectangles to specify a scale transformation for the new container. - 開啟新的圖形容器，並將儲存舊的容器。Opens the new graphics container and saves the old container. - 填入以紅色矩形 (向座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (scaled coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿綠色矩形 （無縮放區座標中） 的已儲存的容器。Fills a green rectangle (to the unscaled coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是綠色矩形，這個矩形覆疊較小的紅色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a smaller red rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除圖形物件的狀態，並不應該呼叫時無法更新的圖形物件。The method clears the state of the graphics object and should not be called when the graphics object cannot be updated. 例如，如果安全桌面上的終端機伺服器工作階段中呼叫方法可能會發生，離開物件不一致的狀態。For example, if the method is called on a secure desktop in a terminal server session, an may occur, leaving the object in an inconsistent state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會清除之繪圖介面的並將背景色彩設定為系統定莪藍綠色色彩顯示。The code clears the drawing surface of the and sets the background color to the system-defined teal color. remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改所傳回的物件屬性不會影響與後續繪圖物件。Modifying the object returned by the property does not affect subsequent drawing with the object. 若要變更的裁剪區域，取代屬性值與新物件。To change the clip region, replace the property value with a new object. 若要判斷是否有無限的裁剪區域，擷取屬性並呼叫其方法。To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the property and call its method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 將程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`SetAndFillClip`方法時處理表單事件，傳遞`e`做為。Paste the code into a form and call the `SetAndFillClip` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的矩形的單位由指定屬性。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 預設單位為像素。The default unit is pixels. A通常與控制項相關聯的來源矩形會相對於該控制項的用戶端區域。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 裁剪區域是無限的如果屬性會傳回一個無意義的大矩形。If the clipping region is infinite, the property returns a meaningless large rectangle. 若要判斷是否有無限的裁剪區域，擷取屬性並呼叫其方法。To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the property and call its method.

span.span: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製弧形的橢圓形的周邊網路的一部分。This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse. 定義橢圓形的矩形界限。The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle. 弧線是周邊網路之間的橢圓形的一部分`startAngle`參數與`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`參數。The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色的畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立繫結橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle to bound an ellipse. - 定義開始 （45 度） 和 （270 度為單位） 的掃掠角度。Defines the start (45 degrees) and sweep (270 degrees) angles. - 將橢圓形弧線繪製到螢幕。Draws the elliptical arc to the screen. 結果會部分遺失的區段之間的橢圓形 + 和-x 軸的 45 度。The result is a partial ellipse missing a segment between + and - 45 degrees of the x axis. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 繪製由四個 結構定義的貝茲曲線。

span.span: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從第一個點繪製貝茲曲線的第四個點。The Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point. 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色的畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立開始、 結束時間和曲線的兩個控制點。Creates the start, end, and two control points for the curve. - 繪製貝茲曲線至畫面。Draws the Bézier curve to the screen. MemberSignature.Value: public void DrawBeziers (System.Drawing.Pen pen, System.Drawing.Point[] points);
.method public hidebysig instance void DrawBeziers(class System.Drawing.Pen pen, valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] points) cil managed

member this.DrawBeziers : System.Drawing.Pen * System.Drawing.Point[] -> unit

param.name: pen
param.span: ，決定曲線的色彩、寬度和樣式。

span.span: that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.

param.name: points
param.span: 結構的陣列，此結構表示決定曲線的點。

span.span: Array of structures that represent the points that determine the curve.

param.span: 在這個陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，例如 4、7 或 10。

span.span: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1, such as 4, 7, or 10.

summary.span: 從 結構陣列繪製一系列的貝茲曲線。

span.span: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的點數應該是 3 的倍數加 1，因為第一個曲線需要 4 個點，而且任何其他曲線需要 3 個點。The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each. 第一個貝茲曲線是取自到點陣列中第四個點的第一個點。The first Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array. 第二個和第三個點都控制點，決定曲線的形狀。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. 後續的每條曲線需要剛好三個重點： 兩個控制點和結束點。Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point. 前一個曲線的結束點用於每個額外的曲線做為起點。The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色的畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立開始、 結束和第一個曲線和端點的兩個控制點和第二個曲線的兩個控制點。Creates the start, end, and two control points for a first curve and endpoint and two control points for a second curve. - 繪製到螢幕的後續的貝茲曲線。Draws the successive Bézier curves to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void DrawClosedCurve (System.Drawing.Pen pen, System.Drawing.Point[] points);
.method public hidebysig instance void DrawClosedCurve(class System.Drawing.Pen pen, valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] points) cil managed

member this.DrawClosedCurve : System.Drawing.Pen * System.Drawing.Point[] -> unit

param.name: pen
param.span: ，決定曲線的色彩、寬度和高度。

span.span: that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.

param.name: points
param.span: 定義曲線的 結構陣列。

span.span: Array of structures that define the spline.

summary.span: 繪製由 結構陣列定義的封閉的基本曲線。

span.span: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中每個點的封閉基本曲線。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不符的第一個點，會將額外的曲線線段加入的最後一個點表示關閉圖形的第一個點。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the figure. 點陣列必須包含至少四個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 以形成封閉的多邊形的七個點之間繪製七個紅色的直線。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a closed polygon. - 繪製封閉的綠色曲線，透過在七個點。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#16)]

summary.span: 使用指定的張力，繪製由 結構定義的封閉基本曲線。

span.span: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of structures using a specified tension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過陣列中每個點的封閉基本曲線。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不相符的第一個點，將額外的曲線線段被加入從最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少四個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製連接點的直線線段。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超過 1.0 f 的值會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define the curve. - 若要建立多邊形的七個點之間繪製七個紅色的直線。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a polygon. - 建立張力，填滿模式設定。Creates tension and fill mode settings. - 繪製封閉的綠色曲線，透過在七個點。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 方法使用 1.0 的張力，填滿模式設定為`FillMode.Alternate`。The method uses a tension of 1.0 and sets the fill mode to `FillMode.Alternate`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#17)]

span.span: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過每個點陣列中的基本曲線。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 點陣列必須包含至少三個曲線要繪製的結構。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 不完整的多邊形的七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 繪製穿過七個點的開啟綠色曲線。Draws an open green curve through the seven points. 方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過每個點陣列中的基本曲線。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 點陣列必須包含至少三個曲線要繪製的結構。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 值`offset`參數會指定略過陣列中的項目數。The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array. 略過的項目之後的第一個項目表示曲線的起點。The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，來繪製曲線中指定的區段數目。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數必須至少為 1。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1. 值`offset`參數，加上的值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是陣列中的項目數少於`points`參數。The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 不完整的多邊形的七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 定義起始點的位移和的區段數目。Defines the starting point offset and number of segments. - 繪製的開啟綠色曲線 （從第三個點開始） 透過最後五個點。Draws an open green curve (starting at the third point) through the last five points. 方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. param.span: 要在曲線中包括的開始點後的線段數目。

span.span: Number of segments after the starting point to include in the curve.

param.name: tension
param.span: 大於或等於 0.0F 的值，指定曲線的張力。

span.span: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.

summary.span: 使用指定的張力，繪製穿過指定陣列的 結構的基本曲線。

span.span: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of structures using a specified tension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製通過每個點陣列中的基本曲線。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 點陣列必須包含至少三個曲線要繪製的結構。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 值`offset`參數會指定略過陣列中的項目數。The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array. 略過的項目之後的第一個項目表示曲線的起點。The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數之後的起點，來繪製曲線中指定的區段數目。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`參數必須至少為 1。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1. 值`offset`參數，加上的值`numberOfSegments`參數必須是陣列中的項目數少於`points`參數。The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製連接點的直線線段。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超過 1.0 f 的值會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 會建立紅色和綠色的畫筆。Creates red and green pens. - 會建立七個點來定義曲線。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 不完整的多邊形的七個點之間繪製六個紅色的直線。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 定義起始點的位移和的區段數目。Defines the starting point offset and number of segments. - 定義張力。Defines the tension. - 繪製的開啟綠色曲線 （從第三個點開始） 透過最後五個點。Draws an open green curve (starting at the third point) through the last five points. 方法會設定為 1.0 的張力。The method sets the tension to 1.0. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#21)]

param.span: 影像不會縮放以符合這個矩形，而是保留它的原始大小。

span.span: The image is not scaled to fit this rectangle, but retains its original size.

param.span: 如果影像比矩形大，則它會裁剪以適合置入此矩形。

span.span: If the image is larger than the rectangle, it is clipped to fit inside it.

summary.span: 繪製由指定之 表示的影像，但不縮放影像。

span.span: Draws the image represented by the specified without scaling the image.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從標準的 Windows 圖示檔 SampIcon.ico example 資料夾中建立的圖示。Creates an icon from a standard Windows icon file SampIcon.ico in the example folder. - 建立矩形，以在其中繪製的圖示。Creates a rectangle in which to draw the icon. - 繪製至畫面的圖示。Draws the icon to the screen. 在畫面中，矩形的位置找出的圖示，並繪製的圖示會縮放，且未裁剪。The position of the rectangle locates the icon on the screen, and the drawn icon is unscaled and unclipped. remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋為單位） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，單位為英吋，映像的是除以水平解析度的像素寬度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 比方說，216 像素寬度以及 72 dpi 為單位的水平解析度的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度] 和 [實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，好讓映像都具有正確大小英吋為單位，不論在顯示裝置解析度 （每英吋點數）。This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫此方法以解析度為 96 dpi 為單位的裝置上繪製該映像時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 則。If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立在該處描繪影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 無縮放的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the unscaled image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#34)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所表示的映像`image`參數可調整且修剪來符合所指定的平行四邊形的圖形`destPoints`參數。The image represented by the `image` parameter is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 將影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 映像會放置在畫面上，平行四邊形的位置和原始的映像和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和繪製影像的修剪。The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. summary.span: 使用原始的實體大小，在指定位置繪製指定的 。

span.span: Draws the specified , using its original physical size, at the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋為單位） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，單位為英吋，映像的是除以水平解析度的像素寬度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 比方說，216 像素寬度以及 72 dpi 為單位的水平解析度的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度] 和 [實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 這個方法會繪製影像使用的實體大小，好讓映像都具有正確大小英吋為單位，不論在顯示裝置解析度 （每英吋點數）。This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫此方法以解析度為 96 dpi 為單位的裝置上繪製該映像時，所呈現影像的像素寬度會是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 則。If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立點，以在該處描繪影像的左上角的座標。Creates the coordinates of a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 無縮放的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the unscaled image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#61](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#61)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#61](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#61)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#61](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#61)]

param.span: 定義平行四邊形之三個 結構的陣列。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定 物件要繪製的部分。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the parameter.

summary.span: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 之指定部分。

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`来繪製物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整，而且修剪來配合所指定之平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 將影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 映像會放置在畫面上，平行四邊形的位置和矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定的縮放和繪製影像的修剪。The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#36)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#36)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`来繪製物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整，而且修剪來配合所指定之平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的地平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立要從中擷取的映像一部分的來源矩形。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 映像會放置在螢幕上的目的地平行四邊形的位置、 來源矩形和大小的大小和形狀目的地平行四邊形的決定調整和修剪繪製的影像，和決定矩形的大小原始的映像的哪些部分是繪製到螢幕。The position of the destination parallelogram locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. param.span: 要繪製的 。

span.span: to draw.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 定義平行四邊形之三個 結構的陣列。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定 物件要繪製的部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the object to draw.

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 列舉的成員，指定 參數所使用的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the parameter.

param.name: imageAttr
param.span: ，指定 物件的重新著色和 Gamma 資訊。

span.span: that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the object.

summary.span: 以指定的大小，在指定的位置繪製所指定 之指定部分。

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`来繪製物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整，而且修剪來配合所指定之平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的地平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立要從中擷取的映像一部分的來源矩形。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製影像已調整的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 原始、 未調整目的地平行四邊形的位置上的畫面、 來源矩形的大小和大小的映像以及目的平行四邊形的圖形會決定縮放和修剪繪製的影像，以及大小矩形會決定哪些部分原始影像繪製到螢幕。For the original, unadjusted destination parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#43](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#43)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#43](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#43)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#43)]

summary.span: 將影像的一部分繪製於指定位置。

span.span: Draws a portion of an image at a specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋為單位） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，單位為英吋，映像的是除以水平解析度的像素寬度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 比方說，像素寬度 360 和 72 點 / 英吋水平解析度的映像有實體寬度為 5 英吋。For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度] 和 [實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 這個方法會繪製的映像使用的實體大小，因此影像部分會有正確的大小英吋為單位，不論解析度 （每英吋點數） 顯示裝置的一部分。This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設影像部分有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫這個方法，以繪製該影像部分的解析度為 96 dpi 為單位的裝置上時，所呈現的影像部分的像素寬度會是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 則。If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立在該處描繪影像的左上角座標。Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 建立要從中擷取的映像一部分的來源矩形。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分未縮放的原始影像繪製到螢幕。The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#59)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#59)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#59)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所定義的矩形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數會決定所繪製影像的大小與位置。The rectangle defined by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters determines the position and size of the drawn image. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立在其中繪製影像的矩形的大小與位置。Creates the position and size of a rectangle in which to draw the image. - 將影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 在畫面中，矩形的位置找出的映像和原始的映像的大小和矩形的大小會決定繪製影像的縮放。The position of the rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`来繪製物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整，而且修剪來配合所指定之平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. 這個多載`callback`參數會提供方法來停止繪製的映像，一旦啟動根據取決於應用程式的準則。This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動螢幕中案例的應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 的定義是簡單，且只會測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主體會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法：Creates an instance of the callback method: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製影像已調整的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 原始、 未調整平行四邊形的映像會放置在畫面上，位置而矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定調整和修剪繪製影像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 由於此範例使用的多載，不會通過`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`true`，會造成方法結束時，並包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `true`, which causes the method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#38)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#38)]

的定義是簡單，且只會測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主體會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製影像已調整的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 原始、 未調整平行四邊形的映像會放置在畫面上，位置而矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定調整和修剪繪製影像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 因為此範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`false`，會造成方法若要繼續，以及調整的影像繪製至畫面。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`參數指定的矩形部分`image`来繪製物件。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 這個部分會調整，而且修剪來配合所指定之平行四邊形`destPoints`參數。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. 這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供方法，以停止繪製的映像，其根據的準則，以及資料取決於應用程式啟動之後。This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動螢幕中案例的應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的`Pa`事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Pa` event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 的定義是簡單，且只會測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主體會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的平行四邊形的點。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 建立矩形來選取要繪製之影像的部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製影像已調整的額外的平行四邊形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 原始、 未調整平行四邊形的映像會放置在畫面上，位置而矩形和大小的大小和形狀的平行四邊形的決定調整和修剪繪製影像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 因為此範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`false`，會造成方法若要繼續，以及調整的影像繪製至畫面。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#45](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#45)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#45)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，以及`srcHeight`參數的指定矩形的部分，`image`来繪製物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合內所指定的矩形`destRect`參數。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的矩形。Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立要從中擷取的映像一部分的來源矩形的座標。Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 將影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the image to the screen. 在畫面中，目的地矩形的位置找出的映像來源和目的地矩形的大小會決定所繪製的影像的縮放比例和來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分原始影像繪製到畫面。The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#48)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#48)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#48)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，以及`srcHeight`參數的指定矩形的部分，`image`来繪製物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合內所指定的矩形`destRect`參數。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立要在其中繪製影像的目的矩形。Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立要從中擷取的映像一部分的來源矩形的座標。Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 設定來源矩形的測量單位為像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立其他的矩形，在其中繪製的已調整的映像。Creates an additional rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整的目的矩形，會放置位置的映像在畫面上，來源和目的地矩形的大小會決定所繪製的影像的縮放比例和來源矩形的大小會決定哪些部分原始的映像會繪製到螢幕。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#53)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#53)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，以及`srcHeight`參數的指定矩形的部分，`image`来繪製物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合內所指定的矩形`destRect`物件。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` object. 這個多載`callback`參數會提供方法來停止繪製的映像，一旦啟動根據取決於應用程式的準則。This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動螢幕中案例的應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 的定義是簡單，且只會測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主體會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形的點。Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立來源矩形來選取要繪製之影像的部分。Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他目的地矩形。Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整的目的矩形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置而來源矩形和大小的大小和目的地矩形的圖案會決定繪製影像的縮放比例。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. 由於此範例使用的多載，不會通過`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`true`，會造成方法結束時，並包含在此範例中的例外狀況處理程式碼會列印出例外狀況文字，而非繪製影像。Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `true`, which causes the method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，以及`srcHeight`參數的指定矩形的部分，`image`来繪製物件。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 矩形是相對於來源影像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 這個部分會調整為適合內所指定的矩形`destRect`參數。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. 這個多載`callback`和`callbackData`參數提供方法，以停止繪製的映像，其根據的準則，以及資料取決於應用程式啟動之後。This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application. 例如，應用程式無法在繪製大型影像，使用者可能會捲動螢幕中案例的應用程式可能會停止繪製影像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會先定義回呼方法，以便委派; 的定義是簡單，且只會測試以查看是否方法會呼叫它具有 null`callBackData`參數。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 此範例的主體會執行下列動作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 建立的執行個體回呼方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立定義要在其中繪製影像的目的地矩形的點。Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 建立來源矩形來選取要繪製之影像的部分。Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 設定圖形的繪製單位為像素。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 原始的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 建立要在其中繪製調整的影像的其他目的地矩形。Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 建立並設定調整的映像，使較大比一般的 gamma 值的屬性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 調整的影像繪製到螢幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 針對原始、 未調整的目的矩形，映像會放置在畫面上，位置而來源矩形和大小的大小和目的地矩形的圖案會決定繪製影像的縮放比例。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. 因為此範例會使用傳遞的多載`callBackData`參數，回呼傳回`false`，會造成方法若要繼續，以及調整的影像繪製至畫面。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#51](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#51)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#51)]

summary.span: 使用原始的實體大小將指定影像繪製於指定位置。

span.span: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋為單位） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，單位為英吋，映像的是除以水平解析度的像素寬度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 比方說，216 像素寬度以及 72 dpi 為單位的水平解析度的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度] 和 [實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，好讓映像都具有正確大小英吋為單位，不論在顯示裝置解析度 （每英吋點數）。The method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫解析度為 96 dpi 為單位的裝置上繪製該映像，轉譯之影像的像素寬度會是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 則。If you call to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從 JPEG 檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例的資料夾中建立映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 建立在該處描繪影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 繪製整個影像使用的實體大小。Draws the entire image using its physical size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#64](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#64)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#64](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#64)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#64)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存值，以像素寬度和水平解析度 （每英吋為單位） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 實體的寬度，單位為英吋，映像的是除以水平解析度的像素寬度。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 比方說，216 像素寬度以及 72 dpi 為單位的水平解析度的映像有實體 3 英吋的寬度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 類似的備註適用於像素高度] 和 [實體的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 方法繪製影像使用的實體大小，好讓映像都具有正確大小英吋為單位，不論在顯示裝置解析度 （每英吋點數）。The method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假設映像有 216 像素寬度和水平解析度 72 每英吋的點數。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果您呼叫解析度為 96 dpi 為單位的裝置上繪製該映像，轉譯之影像的像素寬度會是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 則。If you call to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288.

span.span: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.

summary.span: 繪製由 結構和兩條放射線指定的橢圓形所定義的派形。

span.span: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製弧形的橢圓形和兩條放射線交集弧線的端點所定義的派形。由週框定義橢圓形。This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 組成兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數和之間交集的那些條放射線橢圓形弧線。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為它分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色的畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立界限完整橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定義要開始繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的角度和透過用來繪製 （兩者皆以順時針方向）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 繪製派形區段的螢幕。Draws the pie segment to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會繪製弧形的橢圓形和兩條放射線交集弧線的端點所定義的派形。所描述的週框定義橢圓形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`參數。This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters. 組成兩條放射線所定義的派形`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數和之間交集的那些條放射線橢圓形弧線。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為它分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色的畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立的位置和大小之界限完整橢圓形的矩形。Creates the position and size of a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定義要開始繪圖 （相對於 x 軸） 的角度和透過用來繪製 （兩者皆以順時針方向）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 繪製派形至畫面。Draws the pie shape to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列中的兩個連續點的每一對指定的側邊的多邊形。Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon. 此外，如果不重疊的最後一個點和陣列的第一個點，它們會指定最後一個的側邊的多邊形。In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立黑色的畫筆。Creates a black pen. - 建立七個點的多邊形頂點的陣列。Creates an array of seven points for the vertices of the polygon. - 將多邊形繪製到螢幕。Draws the polygon to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所代表的文字`s`參數表示的矩形內繪製`layoutRectangle`參數。The text represented by the `s` parameter is drawn inside the rectangle represented by the `layoutRectangle` parameter. 如果文字無法容納在矩形內，它會截斷在最接近的字。If the text does not fit inside the rectangle, it is truncated at the nearest word. 若要進一步將矩形內繪製字串的方式來操作多載， 。To further manipulate how the string is drawn inside the rectangle use the overload that takes a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要繪製的文字字串。Creates a text string to draw. - 定義字型設為 Arial (16pt)。Defines the font as Arial (16pt). - 建立穩固、 黑色筆刷來繪製。Creates a solid, black brush to draw with. - 建立要在其中繪製文字的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to draw the text. - 將矩形繪製到螢幕。Draws the rectangle to the screen. - 要使用的字型、 筆刷和目的地矩形在畫面中繪製的字串。Draws the string to the screen using the font, brush, and destination rectangle.
