remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法搭配方法，以建立巢狀的圖形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 圖形容器保留圖形的狀態，例如轉換、 裁剪區域和呈現屬性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 當您識別物件傳遞至方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，並可用來還原當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 容器可以是巢狀;也就是說，您可以呼叫方法數次，才能呼叫方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您會收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法中，當時的狀態會傳回方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放在堆疊上由該方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後，所有的資訊區塊放置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會一併移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 若要呼叫在相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就如同方法呼叫會與配對方法呼叫方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 開啟新的圖形容器，並將儲存舊的容器。Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container. - 將轉譯的容器中的全局座標。Translates the world coordinates in the container. - 會以紅色矩形填滿 (已轉換的座標) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container. - 關閉新的容器，並還原已儲存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填滿綠色矩形 （至未轉換的座標中） 的已儲存的容器。Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container. 結果會是大小的綠色矩形，這個矩形相同的紅色矩形覆疊。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#90](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#90)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#90](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#90)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#90](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#90)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的表單為其中一個私用成員。The following code example creates a form that has a as one of its private members. 方法呼叫，它會呼叫表單的`MetafileCallback`中繼檔中的每一筆記錄的方法。The method calls , which calls the form's `MetafileCallback` method for each record in the metafile. `MetafileCallback` 方法會呼叫 方法。The `MetafileCallback` method calls the method. 請注意，`MetafileCallback`方法會接收記錄資料，當做，但方法預期的記錄資料的位元組陣列。Notice that the `MetafileCallback` method receives the record data as an , but the method expects the record data to be a byte array. 若要在呼叫複製到位元組陣列的記錄資料，以便將它傳遞至。The call to copies the record data to a byte array so that it can be passed to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔會調整，而且修剪來符合之平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔會調整，而且修剪來符合之平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

param.span: 要列舉的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 定義平行四邊型之三個 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 列舉型別的成員，指定用來判斷由 參數指定之矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the parameter contains.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

summary.span: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔會調整，而且修剪來符合之平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 任何繪圖會在所指定的矩形之外發生`srcRect`參數會被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

summary.span: 將指定之 中的記錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的點上顯示。

span.span: Sends the records in the specified , one at a time, to a callback method for display at a specified point using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫的特定方法進行正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數取代的指定中繼檔已寫入時。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

summary.span: 將指定之 的記錄一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的矩形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records of the specified , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數取代的指定中繼檔已寫入時。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 任何繪圖會在所指定的矩形之外發生`srcRect`參數會被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

summary.span: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔會調整，而且修剪來符合之平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 任何繪圖會在所指定的矩形之外發生`srcRect`參數會被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

member this.EnumerateMetafile : System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile * System.Drawing.RectangleF * System.Drawing.RectangleF * System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit * System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc * nativeint -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: graphics.EnumerateMetafile (metafile, destRect, srcRect, srcUnit, callback, callbackData)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: metafile
param.span: 要列舉的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destRect
param.span: 結構，指定所繪製中繼檔的位置和大小。

span.span: structure that specifies the location and size of the drawn metafile.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 列舉型別的成員，指定用來判斷由 參數指定之矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the parameter contains.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

param.name: callbackData
param.span: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

span.span: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.

param.span: 您可以為這個參數傳入 。

span.span: You can pass for this parameter.

summary.span: 將所選取矩形中的資料錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以便在指定的矩形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records of a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the`callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 任何繪圖會在所指定的矩形之外發生`srcRect`參數會被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

span.span: Images, Bitmaps, and Metafiles

param.name: metafile
param.span: 要列舉的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 定義平行四邊型之三個 結構的陣列，會決定所繪製中繼檔的大小和位置。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 結構，指定與其左上角相關且要繪製之中繼檔部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the metafile, relative to its upper-left corner, to draw.

param.name: unit
param.span: 列舉型別的成員，指定用來判斷由 參數指定之矩形所包含之中繼檔部分的測量單位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the unit of measure used to determine the portion of the metafile that the rectangle specified by the parameter contains.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，指定中繼檔記錄被傳送至的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

param.name: callbackData
param.span: 必要但被忽略的內部指標。

span.span: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.

param.span: 您可以為這個參數傳入 。

span.span: You can pass for this parameter.

param.name: imageAttr
param.span: ，指定所繪製影像的影像屬性資訊。

span.span: that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.

summary.span: 將選取之矩形中的記錄從 一次一筆地傳送至回呼方法，以使用指定之影像屬性在指定的平行四邊形中顯示。

span.span: Sends the records in a selected rectangle from a , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會列舉包含指定的中繼檔中的記錄。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每一筆記錄個別傳送至回呼方法所指定`callback`參數。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 一般而言，回呼方法會呼叫「 播放 」，或繪製，記錄的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回呼方法會呼叫，它必須藉由呼叫進行方法的特定正在列舉。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`參數會指定三個的平行四邊形的點。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 三個結構表示的平行四邊形的左上角、 右上方和左下角邊角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四個點會從前前三個以形成平行四邊形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 所繪製中繼檔會調整，而且修剪來符合之平行四邊形。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 任何繪圖會在所指定的矩形之外發生`srcRect`參數會被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 指定的映像屬性`imageAttr`參數取代的指定中繼檔已寫入時。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code example, see .

span.span: Images, Bitmaps, and Metafiles

span.span: Updates the clip region of this to exclude the area specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會排除所指定的區域`rect`參數為目前裁剪區域，並將指派到產生的區域屬性的。This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the property of this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 100 像素 x 100 像素矩形的左上角位於座標 （100，100）。Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100). - 建立矩形所定義的區域。Creates a region defined by the rectangle. - 設定要排除的矩形區域的裁剪區域。Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangular region. - 填滿一個 300 像素，由其左上角位於座標 （0，0） 與實心的藍色筆刷的 300 像素矩形。Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush. 結果是缺少朝著右下角的方形區域的藍色矩形。The result is a blue rectangle with a square region toward its lower-right corner missing. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#92)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#92)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#92)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會排除所指定的區域`region`參數為目前裁剪區域，並將指派到產生的區域屬性的。This method excludes the area specified by the `region` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the property of this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 100 像素 x 100 像素矩形的左上角位於座標 （100，100）。Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100). - 設定要排除之矩形的裁剪區域。Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangle. - 填滿一個 300 像素，由其左上角位於座標 （0，0） 與實心的藍色筆刷的 300 像素矩形。Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush. 結果是缺少朝著右下角的方形區域有藍色矩形。The result is a blue rectangle with a square area toward its lower-right corner missing. summary.span: 填滿由 結構陣列所定義之封閉的基本曲線內部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入陣列中每個點所通過的封閉基本曲線的內部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不相符的第一個點，將額外的曲線線段被加入從最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少四個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 這個方法會使用預設張力為 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立要定義曲線的四個點的陣列。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填滿曲線在螢幕上。Fills the curve on the screen. 曲線具有預設張力為 0.5。The curve has a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#93)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#93)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#93)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入陣列中每個點所通過的封閉基本曲線的內部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最後一個點不相符的第一個點，將額外的曲線線段被加入從最後一個點的第一個點，以將它關閉。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 點陣列必須包含至少四個結構。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`參數會決定曲線的形狀。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果值`tension`參數是 0.0，這個方法會繪製連接點的直線線段。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常，`tension`參數小於或等於 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超過 1.0 f 的值會產生不尋常的結果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立要定義曲線的四個點的陣列。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填滿模式設定為。Sets the fill mode to . - 設定為 1.0 的張力。Sets the tension to 1.0. - 填滿曲線在螢幕上。Fills the curve on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#95](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#95)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#95](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#95)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#95](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#95)]

span.span: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入弧形的橢圓形和兩條放射線交集弧線的端點所定義的派形區段的內部。由週框定義橢圓形。This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 派形區段包含由兩條放射線`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數和之間交集的那些條放射線橢圓形弧線。The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為它分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立橢圓形的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 定義 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和掃掠角度 （以順時針方向兩者）。Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction). - 填滿的派形區域在螢幕上的橢圓形。Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#104](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#104)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#104)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#104)]

param.span: 週框的寬度，這個週框定義派形區段的來源橢圓形。

span.span: Width of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

param.name: height
param.span: 週框的高度，這個週框定義派形區段的來源橢圓形。

span.span: Height of the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie section comes.

param.name: startAngle
param.span: 以度為單位，依順時針方向測量之從 X 軸到派形區段的第一個邊的角度。

span.span: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie section.

param.name: sweepAngle
param.span: 以度為單位，依順時針方向從 參數到派形區段的第二個邊的角度。

span.span: Angle in degrees measured clockwise from the parameter to the second side of the pie section.

summary.span: 填滿由座標對、寬度、高度和兩條放射線指定的橢圓形所定義的派形區域內部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a pair of coordinates, a width, a height, and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會填入弧形的橢圓形和兩條放射線交集弧線的端點所定義的派形區段的內部。由週框定義橢圓形。This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 派形區段包含由兩條放射線`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`參數和之間交集的那些條放射線橢圓形弧線。The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`參數大於 360 度或小於-360 度，它會被視為它分別是 360 度或-360 度。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的紅色筆刷。Creates a solid red brush. - 建立橢圓形的矩形的大小與位置。Creates the location and size of a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 定義 （相對於 x 軸） 的開始角度和掃掠角度 （以順時針方向兩者）。Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction). - 填滿的派形區域在螢幕上的橢圓形。Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#105](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#105)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#105)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#105)]

param.span: ，決定填滿的特性。

span.span: Fills the interior of a polygon defined by an array of points specified by structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個連續的兩個點，在陣列中指定的側邊的多邊形。Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon. 此外，如果最後一個到第一個點不一致，它們會指定多邊形的右端。In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立實心的藍色筆刷。Creates a solid blue brush. - 建立陣列的七個點來定義多邊形。Creates an array of seven points to define a polygon. - 填滿的多邊形的區域，在螢幕上。Fills the polygonal area on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該一律呼叫方法來釋放和相關資源建立方法。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. 顯示裝置沒有相關聯的 ICM 色彩設定檔，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]預設不會使用該設定檔。Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default. 若要啟用的 ICM ，建構HDC 之後您將 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 傳遞給, 從`SetICMMode`函式。To enable ICM for a , construct the from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function. 然後完成任何繪圖將會根據 ICM 設定檔相關聯的顯示裝置的方式來調整。Then any drawing done by the will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device. 啟用 ICM 會導致效能變慢。Enabling ICM will result in slower performance. 裝置內容 （對應模式、 邏輯單元，等等） 時的狀態呼叫可能會影響轉譯由。The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call can affect rendering done by the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會執行下列動作：The code performs the following action: - 建立內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將它設定為表單的圖形物件的裝置內容控制代碼。Creates an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets it to the handle to the device context of the graphics object of the form. - 建立新的圖形物件使用`hdc`。Creates a new graphics object using `hdc`. - 上繪製一個矩形與新的圖形物件 （螢幕）。Draws a rectangle with the new graphics object (on the screen). - 釋出新的圖形物件使用`hdc`。Releases the new graphics object using `hdc`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#118)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#118)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#118)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果映像已經為索引像素格式，此方法會擲回的例外狀況訊息，「 從具有索引像素格式的映像不能建立圖形物件 」。If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format." 下列清單會顯示索引像素格式。The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list. - - - 您也可以使用另一種格式為儲存索引的映像方法，然後擷取新映像的物件。You can save the indexed image as another format by using the method and then retrieve a object for the new image. 這個方法也會擲回例外狀況如果影像具有任何下列的像素格式。This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats. - - - - 您應該一律呼叫方法來釋放和相關資源建立方法。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會執行下列動作：The code performs the following action: - 建立從圖形檔案 SampImag.jpg 範例資料夾中。Creates an from a graphics file SampImag.jpg in the example folder. - 會建立從。Creates a from the . - 改變所填滿的矩形內的映像。Alters the image by filling a rectangle within it. - 繪製至畫面。Draws the to the screen. - 釋放建立。Releases the created . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#120)]

summary.span: 取得目前的 Windows 半色調調色盤的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets a handle to the current Windows halftone palette.

returns.span: 指定調色盤控制代碼的內部指標。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目的方法是啟用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]顯示器使用的每個像素 8 位元時，產生較佳的品質半色調。The purpose of the method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel. 若要顯示使用半色調調色盤映像，請使用下列程序。To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 定義互通性Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll，其中包含必要的屬性[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。Defines interoperability attributes for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll, which contains the necessary [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. - 定義`SelectPalette`和`RealizePalette`為外部該 DLL 中的函式。Defines the `SelectPalette` and `RealizePalette` functions in that DLL as external. - 建立映像從現有的映像檔 SampImag.jpg （這必須是相同的資料夾，做為範例程式碼檔案中），並將影像繪製到螢幕。Creates an image from an existing image file SampImag.jpg (which must be in the same folder as the example code file) and draws the image to the screen. - 建立內部指標類型的變數，並分別將其值設定為 圖形物件和目前的 Windows 半色調調色盤的控制代碼。Creates internal pointer type variables and sets their values to the handle to the graphics object and to the current Windows halftone palette, respectively. - 選取並體認到半色調調色盤。Selects and realizes the halftone palette. - 建立新的圖形物件使用`hdc`參數。Creates a new graphics object using the `hdc` parameter. - 一次繪製影像。Draws the image again. - 釋放裝置內容控制代碼。Releases the handle to the device context. 結果是兩個呈現的範例影像： 16 位元色板和一個 8 位元色板。The result is two renderings of the sample image: one with the 16-bit palette and one with the 8-bit palette. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#121)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#121)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#121)]

summary.span: 取得與這個 關聯之裝置內容的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this .

returns.span: 與這個 關聯之裝置內容的控制代碼。

span.span: Handle to the device context associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裝置內容是根據 Windows 結構[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，定義一組圖形化的物件和其相關聯的屬性，以及會影響輸出的圖形化模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 這個方法會傳回字型的裝置內容。This method returns that device context with the exception of a font. 因為未選取字型，則呼叫方法使用傳回的控制代碼方法將會失敗。Because a font is not selected, calls to the method using a handle returned from the method will fail. 若要呼叫和方法必須出現在配對。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 範圍期間並方法組，您通常只對進行呼叫[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 呼叫，因為範圍對[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法產生`hdc`參數發生`ObjectBusy`錯誤。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]會忽略所做的狀態變更的`hdc`後續作業中的參數。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此範例說明如何呼叫 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式來執行相同的工作[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 定義互通性Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll 的屬性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 這個 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 定義為外部該 DLL 中的函式。Defines the function in that DLL as external. - 會建立紅色的畫筆。Creates a red pen. - 使用畫筆，繪製矩形到畫面時使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定義內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將其值設定為表單的裝置內容控制代碼。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 將矩形繪製到螢幕時使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 釋放所代表的裝置內容`hdc`參數。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#122)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#122)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 使用 ARGB 座標 （255，165、 63，第 136） 中建立的任意色彩。Creates an arbitrary color with ARGB coordinates (255, 165, 63, 136). - 建立實心筆刷，並將其色彩會設定為指定的色彩。Creates a solid brush and sets its color to the specified color. - 填滿橢圓形使用任意色彩。Fills an ellipse using the arbitrary color. - 建立第二個色彩，並將其值設為最接近的系統 ARGB 色彩。Creates a second color and sets its value to the nearest system ARGB color. - 第二個橢圓形填入這個色彩。Fills a second ellipse with this color. 結果是兩個橢圓形： 第一個用來描繪任意指定的色彩和第二個使用最接近的指定色彩的系統色彩繪製。The result is two ellipses: the first drawn with the arbitrary specified color and the second drawn with the system color nearest the specified color. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#123)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#123)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#123)]

summary.span: 將這個 的裁剪區域更新為目前裁剪區域和所指定 結構的交集。

span.span: Updates the clip region of this to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派給屬性的表示為目前裁剪區域和所指定的矩形的交集的區域`rect`參數。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形中的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將之裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填滿大型的矩形包含穩固的藍色筆刷前兩個矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域周圍繪製矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它會使用黑色畫筆的第一個的裁剪方框和紅色的畫筆，而第二個的裁剪區域。It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#124)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#124)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派給屬性的表示為目前裁剪區域和所指定的矩形的交集的區域`rect`參數。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形中的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將之裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填滿大型的矩形包含穩固的藍色筆刷前兩個矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域周圍繪製矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它會使用黑色畫筆的第一個的裁剪方框和紅色的畫筆，而第二個的裁剪區域。It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. span.span: Updates the clip region of this to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派給屬性的表示為目前裁剪區域和所指定區域交集的區域`region`參數。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0）。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0). - 建立區域並將它設定為在矩形中，並設定到此區域的裁剪區域。Creates a region and sets it to the rectangle, and sets the clipping region to this region. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100）。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100). - 建立區域並將其設為第二個矩形中，將裁剪區域設定為此區域和目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 使用的合併模式的交集。Creates a region and sets it to the second rectangle, and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this region and the current clipping region (the first rectangle) using a combine mode of . - 填滿包含穩固的藍色筆刷前兩個區域一個大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous regions with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域周圍繪製矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它會使用黑色畫筆的第一個的裁剪區域和紅色的畫筆，而第二個的裁剪區域。It uses a black pen for the first clipping region and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個區域的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two regions is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#126](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#126)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#126](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#126)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#126](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#126)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形的裁剪區域，並將它設定為表單使用的圖形物件的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using . - 會建立兩個點的裁剪區域內，一個外部。Creates two points, one inside the clipping region and one outside. - 測試每個點的可見性，且只繪製可見。Tests each of the points for visibility and draws only the visible one. 結果是一個小型紅色圓圈，也就是在裁剪區域中。The result is one small red circle, which is within the clip region. summary.span: 取得 物件的陣列，每個陣列框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

span.span: Gets an array of objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.

returns.span: 這個方法傳回 物件的陣列，每個物件框住指定字串中字元位置的範圍。

span.span: This method returns an array of objects, each of which bounds a range of character positions within the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的區域是精確度的解析度相依，因此可能會些微遺失如果字串是精確度的一種解析度中繼檔中記錄，而且稍後播放不同解析度。The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 設定字串 「 第一個和第二個範圍"和顯示字串 ("Times New Roman"，16 點) 的字型。Sets a string "First and Second ranges" and a font for display of the string ("Times New Roman", 16 point). - 設定兩個字元字串內的範圍 （其會對應至文字"First"和"第二個"）。Sets two character ranges within the string (which correspond to the words "First" and "Second"). - 建立用來顯示字串的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to display the string. - 設定字串 ¾ 包括兩個字元範圍的格式。Sets the formatting of the string ¾ including the two character ranges. - 將字串繪製到螢幕。Draws the string to the screen. - 測量的字元範圍，決定矩形的繫結兩個指定的範圍。Measures the character ranges, determines rectangles that bound the two specified ranges. - 繪製到螢幕的兩個矩形。Draws the two rectangles to the screen. 結果是在顯示的字串 ("First") 繫結以紅色矩形的第一個範圍與第二個範圍受限於藍色矩形 （「 第二個"）。The result is the displayed string with the first range ("First") bounded by a red rectangle and the second range ("Second") bounded by a blue rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#135](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#135)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#135](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#135)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#135](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#135)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在搭配個別字串，並包含少量額外的空間之前和之後要允許突出的圖像 （glyph） 的字串。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法會調整最佳化顯示品質的圖像 （glyph） 點，並可能顯示比所回報較窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要取得適用於版面配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串的度量資訊，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得，並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，請確定for是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要測量的字串。Creates a string to measure. - 建立字型物件，並將它設定為新細明體 （16 點）。Creates a font object and sets it to Arial (16 point). - 建立大小物件並使用它與字型物件來測量的字串大小。Creates a size object and uses it and the font object to measure the size of the string. - 繪製紅色矩形，使用字串的測量的大小。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#136](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#136)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#136](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#136)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#136](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#136)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `width`參數會指定傳回的 width 元件的最大值結構 ()。The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned structure (). 如果`width`參數是字串，傳回的實際寬度小於元件會被截斷成值，表示的指定寬度內所容納的字元數上限。If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width. 若要容納整個字串，傳回的元件會調整為可允許顯示字元換行的字串值。To accommodate the entire string, the returned component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap. 方法旨在搭配個別字串，並包含少量額外的空間之前和之後要允許突出的圖像 （glyph） 的字串。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法會調整最佳化顯示品質的圖像 （glyph） 點，並可能顯示比所回報較窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要取得適用於版面配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串的度量資訊，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得，並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，請確定for是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要測量的字串和字型物件設定為新細明體 （16 點）。Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point). - 設定字串的最大寬度。Sets the maximum width of the string. - 建立大小物件，並使用它，字型物件和最大的字串寬度，測量字串的大小。Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum string width to measure the size of the string. - 繪製紅色矩形，使用字串的測量的大小。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在搭配個別字串，並包含少量額外的空間之前和之後要允許突出的圖像 （glyph） 的字串。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法會調整最佳化顯示品質的圖像 （glyph） 點，並可能顯示比所回報較窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要取得適用於版面配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串的度量資訊，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得，並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 此外，請確定for是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立量值和字型的字串物件將它設定為新細明體 （16 點）。Creates a string to measure and a font object set it to Arial (16 point). - 設定字串的最大寬度。Sets the maximum width of the string. - 建立字串的格式物件，並將它的格式旗標設定為。Creates a string format object and sets its format flags to . - 建立大小來測量的字串物件。Creates a size object to measure the string. - 測量字串，並使用字串、 字型物件、 最大寬度和字串的格式的大小。Measures the size of the string, using the string, the font object, the maximum width, and the string format. - 繪製紅色矩形，使用字串的測量的大小。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. 結果是垂直矩形封入垂直的字串。The result is a vertical rectangle enclosing a vertical string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在搭配個別字串，並包含少量額外的空間之前和之後要允許突出的圖像 （glyph） 的字串。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法會調整最佳化顯示品質的圖像 （glyph） 點，並可能顯示比所回報較窄字串。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要取得適用於版面配置 （例如，實作格式化的文字） 中的相鄰字串的度量資訊，請使用方法或其中一個方法，取得，並傳遞。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a and pass . 也請確定for是。Also ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立要測量的字串和字型物件設定為新細明體 （16 點）Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point) - 設定字串的最大的配置大小。Sets the maximum layout size of the string. - 建立字串的格式物件，並將它的格式旗標設定為。Creates a string format object and sets its format flags to . - 會建立整數變數`charactersFitted`和`linesFilled`和大小的物件，以量值的字串。Creates the integer variables `charactersFitted` and `linesFilled` and a size object to measure the string. - 測量的字串大小，並判斷的字元數和已填入，請使用字串、 字型物件、 最大的配置大小，以及字串格式的行數。Measures the size of the string and determines the number of characters fitted and lines filled, using the string, the font object, the maximum layout size, and the string format. - 繪製紅色矩形，使用字串的測量的大小。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 繪製所繪製的矩形內的字串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. - 繪製的字元數和填滿的行數的值。Draws the values of the number of characters fitted and lines filled. 結果是垂直矩形封入垂直的字串。The result is a vertical rectangle enclosing a vertical string. span.span: Multiplies the world transformation of this and specified the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法之前加上所指定的矩陣`matrix`參數，使結果`matrix`x 全局轉換。This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立`transformMatrix`（兩個由兩個身分識別矩陣，加上零轉譯向量） 的矩陣。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 轉換以轉換矩陣的向量 （200，100）。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - 旋轉 30 度的 Windows Form 的自然變換矩陣，前面加上 30 度表單的轉換矩陣的旋轉矩陣。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepends the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 旋轉的全局轉換矩陣乘以翻譯`transformMatrix`，和之前加上`transformMatrix`全局轉換矩陣。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, and prepends the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#143)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#143)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#143)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為for`order`參數指定的乘法運算順序是`matrix`x 全局轉換。A value of for the `order` parameter specifies that the order of the multiplication is `matrix` x world transformation. 值為for`order`指定的乘法運算順序是全局轉換 x `matrix`。A value of for `order` specifies that the order of the multiplication is world transformation x `matrix`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立`transformMatrix`（兩個由兩個身分識別矩陣，加上零轉譯向量） 的矩陣。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 轉換以轉換矩陣的向量 （200，100）。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - 旋轉 30 度，前面加上 30 度表單的轉換矩陣的旋轉矩陣中的 Windows Form 的自然變換矩陣。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 旋轉的全局轉換矩陣乘以翻譯`transformMatrix`、 附加`transformMatrix`全局轉換矩陣。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, appending the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. remarks.format: ## Remarks 裝置內容是根據 Windows 結構[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，定義一組圖形化的物件和其相關聯的屬性，以及會影響輸出的圖形化模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 若要呼叫和方法必須出現在配對。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 範圍期間並方法組，您通常呼叫只[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 呼叫，因為範圍對[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法產生`hdc`參數發生`ObjectBusy`錯誤。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]會忽略所做的狀態變更的`hdc`後續作業中的參數。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此範例說明如何呼叫 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式來執行相同的工作[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 定義互通性Windows DLL 檔案 gdi32.dll 的屬性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 這個 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式，而且它會定義為外部該 DLL 中的函式。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function, and it defines the function in that DLL as external. - 會建立紅色的畫筆。Creates a red pen. - 使用畫筆，繪製矩形到畫面時使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定義內部指標類型變數`hdc`並將其值設定為表單的裝置內容控制代碼。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 將矩形繪製到螢幕時使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函式。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 釋放所代表的裝置內容`hdc`參數。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. summary.span: 將這個 的裁剪區域重設為無限區域。

span.span: Resets the clip region of this to an infinite region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當的裁剪區域為無限，這個項目繪製不裁剪。When the clipping region of a is infinite, items that this draws are not clipped. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立矩形左上角，在 （0，0） 和設定這個矩形中的裁剪區域。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 建立第二個矩形左上角，在 （100，100） 並將之裁剪區域設定為目前裁剪區域 （第一個矩形） 這個矩形的交集。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填滿大型的矩形包含穩固的藍色筆刷前兩個矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 將裁剪區域重設為無限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 兩個裁剪區域; 周圍繪製矩形它會使用黑色畫筆的第一個的裁剪方框和紅色的畫筆，而第二個的裁剪區域。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions; it uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 結果是兩個矩形的交集會填滿藍色。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#146)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#146)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#146)]

summary.span: 將這個 的自然變換矩陣重設為識別矩陣。

span.span: Resets the world transformation matrix of this to the identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 身分識別矩陣表示具有沒有縮放、 旋轉或轉移的轉換。The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation. 重設這個全局轉換身分識別矩陣來表示其全局轉換不會變更之幾何的轉換後的項目。Resetting the world transformation of this to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯以向量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 儲存表單的圖形狀態。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 重設表單的全局轉換至身分識別，並使用實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 還原已轉換的圖形狀態，並使用穩固的藍色筆刷填滿的矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush. 結果會是未轉譯的紅色填滿矩形和翻譯的藍色填滿矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#147)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#147)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#147)]

summary.span: 將這個 的狀態，還原成 所代表的狀態。

span.span: Restores the state of this to the state represented by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫方法，保留狀態的資訊區塊放在堆疊上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法會傳回可識別該資訊區塊。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 傳遞時，用來識別要方法，資訊區塊會從堆疊移除，並可用來還原當時的狀態方法呼叫。When you pass the identifying to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 請注意，所指定的呼叫傳回方法可以一次傳遞至`Restore`方法。Note that the returned by a given call to the method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method. 若要呼叫方法可以巢狀; 也就是說，您可以呼叫方法多次，才能呼叫方法。Calls to the method can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次呼叫方法，一個資訊區塊會放在堆疊上，而且您會收到資訊區塊。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 傳遞時，這些物件的其中一個方法中，當時的狀態會傳回方法呼叫傳回的特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 資訊區塊放在堆疊上由該方法呼叫會從堆疊移除，且之後，所有的資訊區塊放置於該堆疊上方法呼叫也會一併移除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 若要呼叫在相同呼叫堆疊上方法的位置資訊區塊方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就如同呼叫搭配呼叫，請方法呼叫搭配方法呼叫。Just as a call is paired with a call, a method call is paired with a method call. 當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同樣地，當您呼叫方法中，放置在堆疊上的所有資訊區塊 (由方法或由方法) 之後的對應呼叫方法會從堆疊中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 將 Windows Form 的自然變換轉譯以向量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 儲存表單的圖形狀態。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 重設表單的全局轉換至身分識別，並使用實心的紅色筆刷填滿的矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 還原的已翻譯的圖形狀態，並使用實心的藍色筆刷填滿第二個矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a second rectangle with a solid blue brush. 結果會是未轉譯的紅色填滿矩形和翻譯的藍色填滿矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#148)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#148)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旋轉作業包括將其項目衍生自的矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`angle`參數。The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter. 這個方法會將旋轉套用加到變換矩陣。This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows Form 的自然變換矩陣依向量平移 （100，0）。Translates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by the vector (100, 0). - 旋轉的角度 30 度，附加在前面的自然變換矩陣的旋轉矩陣的自然變換。Rotates the world transformation by an angle of 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix to the world transformation matrix. - 使用藍色的畫筆繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. span.span: Scale factor in the y direction.

summary.span: 透過將指定的縮放作業放置在物件的轉換矩陣之前，將作業套用至此 的轉換矩陣。

span.span: Applies the specified scaling operation to the transformation matrix of this by prepending it to the object's transformation matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在調整作業包含將其項目是對角線矩陣轉換矩陣乘以 (`sx`， `sy`，1)。The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1). 這個方法預先規劃的轉換矩陣的縮放矩陣。This method prepends the transformation matrix of the by the scaling matrix. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 旋轉 30 度的 Windows Form 的自然變換矩陣。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees. - 前面加上的縮放轉換，將該矩陣以 x 方向的 3 倍，並在 y 方向的 1 倍。Scales that matrix by a factor of 3 in the x direction and a factor of 1 in the y direction by prepending the scaling transformation. - 縮放、 旋轉使用畫筆繪製矩形藍色。Draws a scaled, rotated rectangle with a blue pen. 結果仍是一個矩形。The result is still a rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 平滑模式指定線條、 曲線和填滿區域的邊緣是否使用平滑處理 （也稱為反鋸齒功能）。The smoothing mode specifies whether lines, curves, and the edges of filled areas use smoothing (also called antialiasing). 路徑漸層筆刷不會遵照平滑模式是一個例外。One exception is that path gradient brushes do not obey the smoothing mode. 使用填滿的區域會呈現相同的方式 （別名），不論屬性。Areas filled using a are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the property. ## Examples 下列方法示範如何設定的效果， ，和屬性。The following method demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 此範例的輸出是由下列圖所示。The output of the example is shown in the following illustration. ![行數並沒有套用平滑效果。](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "行而是否套用平滑效果。")![Lines with and without smoothing applied.](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "Lines with and without smoothing applied.") 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 將程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法時處理表單事件，傳遞`e`做為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . summary.span: 取得或設定這個 幾何自然轉換的複本。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric world transformation for this .

value.span: 的複本，代表這個 的幾何自然轉換。

span.span: A copy of the that represents the geometric world transformation for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks GDI + 會使用三種座標空間： 世界、 頁面和裝置。GDI+ uses three coordinate spaces: world, page, and device. 全局座標是用來建立模型為特定圖形範圍的座標，您將傳遞給方法，在.NET Framework 中的座標。World coordinates are the coordinates used to model a particular graphic world and are the coordinates you pass to methods in the .NET Framework. 頁面座標是指繪圖介面，例如表單或控制項所使用的座標系統。Page coordinates refer to the coordinate system used by a drawing surface, such as a form or a control. 裝置座標是實體裝置上，繪製螢幕或印表機等所使用的座標。Device coordinates are the coordinates used by the physical device being drawn on, such as a screen or a printer. 屬性表示全局轉換，這會對應到頁面座標的全局座標。The property represents the world transformation, which maps world coordinates to page coordinates. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性是一份幾何的轉換，當您不再需要時，您應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立兩個點，並繪製其間的藍線。Creates two points and draws a blue line between them. - 設定全局轉換 40 x 方向和 30，y 方向的數量。Sets the world transform to translate by amounts 40 in the x direction and 30 in the y direction. - 轉換全局座標的點 () 成頁面座標 ()。Transforms the points from world coordinates () to page coordinates (). - 身分識別，重設全局轉換。Resets the world transformation to the identity. - 已轉換的點之間繪製紅線。Draws a red line between the transformed points. 結果會是藍色的線條和翻譯的紅線，其下。The result is a blue line and a translated red line below it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 來源通常是上限--左下角的繪圖介面。The origin is typically the upper-left-hand corner of the drawing surface. 轉譯作業包括將其轉譯部分是的矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`dx`和`dy`參數。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 這個方法會將轉換套用前面加上轉換矩陣的轉移矩陣。This method applies the translation by prepending the translation matrix to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 30.0F 度旋轉 Windows Form 的自然變換的矩陣。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 移動圖形物件的來源，藉由呼叫，前面加上之翻譯的轉換矩陣。Moves the origin of the graphics object by calling , prepending the translation to the transformation matrix. - 翻譯、 旋轉使用畫筆繪製橢圓形藍色。Draws a translated, rotated ellipse with a blue pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#167)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#167)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#167)] 下圖顯示執行上述的程式碼範例的輸出。The following illustration shows the output of running the previous code example. ![轉譯和轉換的橢圓形](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "轉譯和轉換的橢圓形")![Translated and transformed ellipse](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "Translated and transformed ellipse")

summary.span: 依照指定的順序，將指定之轉換套用至這個 的變換矩陣，以變更座標系統的原點。

span.span: Changes the origin of the coordinate system by applying the specified translation to the transformation matrix of this in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉譯作業包括將其轉譯部分是的矩陣轉換矩陣乘以`dx`和`dy`參數。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 這個方法之前加上或附加的變換矩陣所根據的轉譯矩陣`order`參數。This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the by the translation matrix according to the `order` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 30.0F 度旋轉 Windows Form 的自然變換的矩陣。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 藉由呼叫移動圖形物件的原始，將轉譯附加到的自然變換矩陣。Moves the graphics object's origin by calling , appending the translation to the world transformation matrix. - 使用藍色的畫筆繪製旋轉、 轉換的橢圓形。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. summary.span: 取得這個 之可見裁剪區域的週框。

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of the visible clipping region of this .

value.span: 結構，代表這個 之可見裁剪區域的周框。

span.span: A structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the visible clipping region of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生的矩形的單位由指定屬性。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 預設單位為像素。The default unit is pixels. A通常與控制項相關聯的來源矩形會相對於該控制項的用戶端區域。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 之可見裁剪區域是這樣的裁剪區域的交集和視窗的裁剪區域。The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this and the clipping region of the window.
